name: mvmr_server
description: MVMR (Merging of Vulnerability Mapping Results) is a web app that provides useful support to pentesters during penetration testing activities. In fact, once a pentester has collected information regarding the vulnerabilities of one or more hosts in XML format, he or she can input these files to MVMR to obtain a final report that will detail and merge the information gathered from different sources such as Nmap, Owasp ZAP, Nessus and OpenVAS.
author: Carmine Sorrentino
